ygData.subject: Re: Knight
ygData.msgSnippet: A friend of mine got a playing card (I think that s what the knight is). He found it and picked it up.  Another member of our group noticed a guard had walked
ygData.messageBody:
A friend of mine got a playing card (I think that's what the knight is).
He found it and picked it up. Another member of our group noticed a
guard had walked by and said "oops, looks like I dropped something...".
I think the quest might be to return the card to the guy who dropped it.
In our case, we were in the Qeynos hills I believe.

-----Original Message-----
From: Joseph E. Nisse [mailto:nisse@...]
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 7:57 AM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Knight


From: "Joseph E. Nisse" <nisse@...>

>what level were you when you took him out?
>and is this the end of the two token quest?
>
>this has to be another quest item... but for what? Maybe you can
petition a
gm
>and trade it to have Sir added to your name?

I was level 11 when I took him out. Probably why I didn't get much in
return.

What is the two token quest?

Will a gm help you with a question about an item? I thought they
wouldn't.

--Bruceson
